name: One More Day;
description:
One More Day; is an interactive fiction short story made in the spinoff app about the crossroads of decision-making. 

The story follows you, whoever you may be. Whatever background you come from, you build the story. It’s often hard to put yourself in someone else's shoes, so don’t. Make the story fit so that you can understand what you would do in “that person's shoes.”

Our past creates our biases, drives our choices, and could also be the very thing that brings us together. This game's purpose is to spread awareness of the absolutely devastating numbers of the invisible faces of “endangered runaways.”

If you or someone you know is thinking or currently at a loss for what to do, take it ONE DAY at a time.

------------------------------------------------

A magical internal journey to self-worth, discovery, and perseverance.

Created for the Mini Interactive Story Jam #2.5 in 20 days!

Anjali Kai - Creator, Writer, and Developer

Commissioned Music by Kayupla for an original soundtrack!
